attributes.action: Immediate English referendum on England leaving the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details:
Immediate English referendum on England leaving the United Kingdom.
The three questions posed to be:  do you want  England to become independent
of 1. Scotland , 2. Northern Ireland and 3. Wales?  Simply Yes or No.
It is proposed that in the event of a majority vote for any of the above, that negotiations
for dissolution would be initiated with each national assembly.
